Hello—I'm Lillian Chen, a Cornell University sophomore studying computer science in chilly Ithaca, NY. As a long-term art junkie and web surfer, I've found a loving home in website development and design.

When I'm not doing classwork, I'll be in The Popshop doing cool things for startups like Yorango and Fiberspark. I'm currently heavily involved in particular with ellaspark* and we're working hard to get it to launch soon!

I'm also the current Design Editor of The Cornell Business Review. I do everything from layouting the each issue to designing advertising campaigns. Read the latest release here!
